duel.title: New duel challenge
duel.action: React to this message to accept or decline the duel.
duel.expire: **{invited}** does not have answered to the challenge.
duel.unknown-user: You could not challenge **{username}**. Please mention another user.

game.title: :game_die: **TicTacToe game:** {player1} **VS** {player2}
game.end: No one won the game, it's a tie! Let's try again?
game.expire: Game has **expired** because of the inactivity of one user.
